verses.verse: "Come down, <S%H3381><s%> and sit <S%H3427><s%> in the dust, <S%H6083><s%> virgin <S%H1330><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon; <S%H894><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> on the ground <S%H776><s%> without a throne, <S%H3678><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of the Chaldeans: <S%H3778><s%> for you shall no more <S%H3254><s%> be called <S%H7121><s%> tender <S%H7390><s%> and delicate. <S%H6028><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> the millstones, <S%H7347><s%> and grind <S%H2912><s%> meal; <S%H7058><s%> remove <S%H1540><s%> your veil, <S%H6777><s%> strip <S%H2834><s%> off the train, <S%H7640><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the leg, <S%H7785><s%> pass through <S%H5674><s%> the rivers. <S%H5104><s%>

Your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> shall be uncovered, <S%H1540><s%> yes, <S%H2781><s%> your shame shall be seen: <S%H7200><s%> I will take <S%H3947><s%> vengeance, <S%H5359><s%> and will spare <S%H6293><s%> no man. <S%H120><s%>"
Our Redeemer, <S%H1350><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> is his name, <S%H8034><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

"Sit <S%H3427><s%> in silence, <S%H1748><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> into darkness, <S%H2822><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> of the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%> for you shall no more <S%H3254><s%> be called <S%H7121><s%> the mistress <S%H1404><s%> of kingdoms. <S%H4467><s%>

I was angry <S%H7107><s%> with my people, <S%H5971><s%> I profaned <S%H2490><s%> my inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them into your hand: <S%H3027><s%> you showed <S%H7760><s%> them no mercy; <S%H7356><s%> on the aged <S%H2205><s%> you have very <S%H3966><s%> heavily <S%H3513><s%> laid your yoke. <S%H5923><s%>

You said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H1404><s%> 'I shall be a mistress forever; <S%H5769><s%>' so that you did not lay <S%H7760><s%> these things to your heart, <S%H3820><s%> nor did you remember <S%H2142><s%> the latter end of it. <S%H319><s%>

"Now therefore hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H5719><s%> you who are given to pleasures, who sit <S%H3427><s%> securely, <S%H983><s%> who say <S%H559><s%> in your heart, <S%H3824><s%> <S%H657><s%> 'I am, and there is none else besides me; <S%H3427><s%> I shall not sit as a widow, <S%H490><s%> neither shall I know <S%H3045><s%> the loss of children: <S%H7908><s%>'

but these two <S%H8147><s%> things shall come <S%H935><s%> to you in a moment <S%H7281><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> the loss of children, <S%H7908><s%> and widowhood; <S%H489><s%> in their full measure <S%H8537><s%> shall they come <S%H935><s%> on you, <S%H7230><s%> in the multitude of your sorceries, <S%H3785><s%> and the great <S%H3966><s%> abundance <S%H6109><s%> of your enchantments. <S%H2267><s%>

For you have trusted <S%H982><s%> in your wickedness; <S%H7451><s%> you have said, <S%H559><s%> No one sees <S%H7200><s%> me; <S%H2451><s%> your wisdom and your knowledge, <S%H1847><s%> it has perverted <S%H7725><s%> you, <S%H559><s%> and you have said in your heart, <S%H3820><s%> I am, <S%H657><s%> and there is none else besides me.

Therefore evil <S%H7451><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> on you; <S%H3045><s%> you won't know when it dawns: <S%H7837><s%> and mischief <S%H1943><s%> will fall <S%H5307><s%> on you; <S%H3201><s%> you will not be able to put it away: <S%H3722><s%> and desolation <S%H7722><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> on you suddenly, <S%H6597><s%> which you don't <S%H3045><s%> know.

"Stand <S%H5975><s%> now with your enchantments, <S%H2267><s%> and with the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your sorceries, <S%H3785><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> you have labored <S%H3021><s%> from your youth; <S%H5271><s%> if so be you shall be able <S%H3201><s%> to profit, <S%H3276><s%> if so be you may prevail. <S%H6206><s%>

You are wearied <S%H3811><s%> in the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your counsels: <S%H6098><s%> let now the astrologers, <S%H1895><s%> the stargazers, <S%H2374><s%> the monthly <S%H2320><s%> prognosticators, <S%H3045><s%> stand up, <S%H5975><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> you from the things that shall come on you. <S%H935><s%>

Behold, <S%H7179><s%> they shall be as stubble; the fire <S%H784><s%> shall burn <S%H8313><s%> them; <S%H5337><s%> they shall not deliver themselves <S%H5315><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the flame: <S%H3852><s%> it shall not be a coal <S%H1513><s%> to warm <S%H2552><s%> at, <S%H217><s%> nor a fire to sit before. <S%H3427><s%>

Thus shall the things be to you in which you have labored: <S%H3021><s%> those who have trafficked <S%H5503><s%> with you from your youth <S%H5271><s%> shall wander <S%H8582><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> to his quarter; <S%H5676><s%> there shall be none to save you. <S%H3467><s%>
